• During a COVID-19 wave, all pregnant women who need admission must be tested for COVID-19 using a rapid
ant
igen test, conducted on arrival, on-site in the maternity admissions area, so that a result is available withi n
15
-30 minutes of arrival. Further management will depend on the rapid antigen test result and the presence or
absence of symptoms suggestive of COVID-19.
• During times when there is no COVID -19 wave, all pregnant women needing admission who screen negative
for COVID-19
